custom_css: a,h1,input {color: #ffffff; background-color: #222222; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px; padding: 10px 15px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 20px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; transition: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease; text-align: center;}

a,input {color: #ffffff; background-color: #222222; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px; padding: 10px 15px; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 20px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; transition: background-color 0.3s ease, color 0.3s ease; text-align: center;}
